text: Toca allaha hoya, jyane tumacyavara grantha avatarita kela, jyata spasta ani thosa ayati aheta, jo mula grantha ahe ani kahi samana ayati aheta. Maga jyancya manata vakrata ahe tara te samana ayatincya mage padatata, phituri majavinyakarita ani tyacya spastikaranakarita, parantu tyancya kharya uddistala allahasivaya konihi janata nahi. Ani paripurna va majabuta jnana rakhanare vidvanadekhila heca mhanatata ki amhi tara tyancyavara imana rakhale ahe. He sarva amacya palanakartyatarphe ahe, ani bodha-upadesa tara kevala bud'dhimana lokaca prapta karatata
